title: AVATAR: A Parallel Corpus for Java-Python Program Translation. (arXiv:2108.11590v2 [cs.SE] UPDATED)
abstract: Program translation refers to migrating source code from one programming language to another. It has tremendous practical value in software development, as porting software across languages is time-consuming and costly. Automating program translation is of paramount importance in software migration, and recently researchers explored unsupervised approaches due to the unavailability of parallel corpora. However, the availability of pre-trained language models for programming languages enables supervised fine-tuning with a small number of labeled examples. Therefore, we present AVATAR, a collection of 9,515 programming problems and their solutions written in two popular languages, Java and Python. AVATAR is collected from competitive programming sites, online platforms, and open-source repositories. Furthermore, AVATAR includes unit tests for 250 examples to facilitate functional correctness evaluation. We benchmark several pre-trained language models fine-tuned on AVATAR. Experiment res

Title: AVATAR: A Parallel Corpus for Java-Python Program Translation. (arXiv:2108.11590v2 [cs.SE] UPDATED)
Abstract: Program translation refers to migrating source code from one programming language to another. It has tremendous practical value in software development, as porting software across languages is time-consuming and costly. Automating program translation is of paramount importance in software migration, and recently researchers explored unsupervised approaches due to the unavailability of parallel corpora. However, the availability of pre-trained language models for programming languages enables supervised fine-tuning with a small number of labeled examples. Therefore, we present AVATAR, a collection of 9,515 programming problems and their solutions written in two popular languages, Java and Python. AVATAR is collected from competitive programming sites, online platforms, and open-source repositories. Furthermore, AVATAR includes unit tests for 250 examples to facilitate functional correctness evaluation. We benchmark several pre-trained language models fine-tuned on AVATAR. Experiment res
translated_title: AVATAR：Java-Python程序翻译的平行语料库
translated_abstract: 程序翻译指将源代码从一种编程语言迁移到另一种编程语言。它在软件开发中具有巨大的实用价值，因为跨语言移植软件耗时且成本高昂。自动进行程序翻译在软件迁移中至关重要，最近研究人员由于找不到平行语料库而探索了无监督方法。然而，预先训练的编程语言语言模型的可用性使得用少量标记样本进行有监督的微调成为可能。因此，我们提出了AVATAR，包含9,515个使用两种流行语言（Java和Python）编写的编程问题及其解决方案的集合。AVATAR从竞技编程网站、在线平台和开源存储库中收集。此外，AVATAR还包含了250个示例的单元测试，以便进行功能正确性评估。我们对AVATAR微调了几个预训练语言模型并进行了基准测试。实验结果表明，微调的模型在程序翻译质量上明显优于无监督模型。AVATAR可以促进程序翻译模型的有监督学习，并作为评估无监督方法的基准。
tldr: AVATAR是一个 Java-Python平行语料库，包含 9,515个编程问题和解决方案，可用于有监督学习和评估无监督方法的程序翻译模型，并且微调的模型在编程语言翻译的质量上优于无监督模型。
en_tdlr: AVATAR is a parallel corpus for Java-Python program translation, consist of 9,515 programming problems and their solutions, which can be used for supervised learning and evaluating unsupervised approaches of program translation. The fine-tuned models on AVATAR outperform unsupervised models significantly in program translation quality.
